com.rattat.micro.game.aster.mvc
Interface GameListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
Midlet, SoundManager, VibrationManager
public interface GameListener

Defines an interface which objects wishing to observe game events must implement.

Events are defined using the public static integers like EVENT_THRUST_START and EVENT_MISSILE_FIRED which are defined in this interface.

Author:
william@rattat.com

EVENT_SHIP_MORTAL

static final int EVENT_SHIP_MORTAL
Event fired when the users space ship becomes mortal. This is a short time after gameplay starts to give the user a chance to get into position when the l;evel first starts.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

gameEvent

void gameEvent(int gameEvent,
               Model model)

Objects who wish to observe game events fired by the GameController class must implement this interface

Objects can see and alter the state of the game by performing operations on the model parameter.

Parameters:
gameEvent - The event that has been fired
model - The model of the game
See Also:
GameController.addListener(GameListener listener)
